channel.title: Layouts - Ebiten UI
channel.description: The library allows you to compose containers in many different ways, and this chapter will tell you about each of them.

item.title: Anchor
item.description: Anchor layout allows the child containers to be anchored to a specific constraint.

item.title: Row
item.description: Row layout places all child containers in one row or column. It can be useful for creating lists of widgets.

item.title: Grid
item.description: Grid layout puts all child containers in an even grid, wrapping each row based on the number of columns.
